name: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
We are looking for Senior DevOps Engineer

What You’ll Be Doing:

  • As a part of a product team you'll be responsible for CI\CD pipelines for a team.
  • You'll write\update\improve IaaC code Base for a team infrastructure, develop monitoring, observability and alerting of our systems.
  • Increase the usability and performance of developing tools.
  • Bring an automation in a daily-basis product team tasks

What We Look For In You:

  • You had an experience in a successful product team
  • Experience in developing CI\CD pipelines, understanding DevOps principles and implementing them in production environments
  • In-depth knowledge and expertise in providing scalability, stability and availability production highload systems.
  • Deep understanding of Linux systems and networking
  • Good knowledge in building IaaC with Ansible and Terraform

Nice-to-have:

  • Production experience in a huge projects based in public clouds, understanding cloud-native architecture
  • Understanding SRE practicies
  • Experience in self-healing and zero-downtime projects.

Why Should You Join Our Team?

  • Great challenges with fast feedback loops
  • A welcoming group of highly qualified international professionals
  • Cutting-edge hardware and technology
  • Remote from anywhere in the world
  • Flexible schedule
  • 40 paid days off
  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
